definition: euphemism (tactful expression for sth unpleasant such as death)
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: I invited her to join us- but she declined.
sentences.chinese: 我約請她和我們在一同，可是她婉詞謝絕了。
我婉詞謝絕了他們的聘請。
